original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 321/324 against the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were down and the rupee closed at 321/324 against the US dollar in the spot market on Monday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 28.60/80 percent on Monday, down from 29.80/30.20 percent on Friday.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 26.50/60 percent, down from 27.45/55 percent on Friday.
Sri Lanka rupee closed at 321/324 rupees against the US dollar, from 328/329 rupees from a day earlier.  (Colombo/ April 03/2023)
